text:
SEEKING FREELANCERS/EMPLOYEES - NYC preferred, but remote quite conceivable

HappyFunCorp (https://happyfuncorp.com) - We're currently seeking good Rails, Django, React, and mobile developers, as well as excellent technical project managers.

We do web and app development for a panoply of clients ranging from Fortune 500 to brand-new startups: right now the distribution is roughly 50-50. We prefer people with a reasonable amount of experience under their belt, but there are always exceptions. And we pay well.

If interested, email: jobs@happyfuncorp.com
